DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective multi-center patient cohort study investigate patient persistent atrial fibrillation ( AF ) elective cardioversion ( ECV ) . The aim identify clinical predictor ineffective ECV improve management quality persistent AF .
DOC.detailed_description: Data gather patient registry two finnish university hospital two regional hospital time period 2003-2015 . A data search conduct use ICD-10 code atrial fibrillation NCSP code cardioversion . All patient AF perform cardioversion eligible study . Initially , 2373 patient capture ECV case identify include manually study use structure electronic case report form . The study cohort comprise 1998 ECVs 1342 patient . Follow-up data gather 30 day ECV stroke , transient ischemic attack , arrhythmic complication , AF recurrences fail cardioversions record subject careful exploration . IBM SPSS Statistics software version 22.0 use perform analysis .
DOC.criteria: All patient persistent ( > 48h ) atrial fibrillation elective electrical cardioversion Cardioversions patient acute ( < 48h ) atrial fibrillation Pharmacological cardioversions
